message: Let's make this easy. I'll take 6000, you get 4000. Fair deal, considering we have a limited time!
How about I take 4500 and you take 5500? It's still a fair split and better for both of us!
Alright, I see your counteroffer. Considering the time and inflation, I'll stick to my guns, and this is my final offer: I get 5500, you get 4500. Take it or leave it, Bob!
Let's find some common ground. I propose a split where I take 4000 and you take 6000. This way, we both get a fair amount even with the inflation!
